title: heyspongebob

content: What Music Trust & Song Trader? https://www.musictrust.io/       NFT SONG PLATFORM: https://www.songtrader.io/   NFT Music Streaming platform: https://www.mixify.io/Music Trust is a revolutionary NFT music distribution platform that gives artists the ability to sell music in the form of NFT’s. The platform bridges conventional music contracts (Merlin) to Crypto. This allows music to be listed on music streaming platforms and the royalties to be collected and paid with crypto to the NFT holder. Royalties are paid directly to the NFT holder via bridging or can be paid with fiat. Music Trust consists of four major platforms in it’s ecosystem. Music Trust  https://www.musictrust.io/, our NFT music distribution platform, https://www.songtrader.io NFT marketplace for art and music. https://www.Tickethodler.com which specializes in digital passports for the metaverse and ticket sales and finally  https://www.Mixify.io a first of it’s kind music streaming platform for the metaverse.OVERVIEWName : Music TrustSymbol : TRUSTTotal Supply : 1,000,000,000 Decimals : 18Blockchain : Binance Smart ChainTOKEN ADDRESS0xdd289035322394c986d6c6a797073478f45c0ce6We are launching a special sale of tokens on Gemsale on November 1st, 2022.https://gempad.app/special/0x1e9142096Fc681B6388EbF690b963322991AaF2B?chainId=56Special Sale Start Time (UTC)2022-11-01 12:49LINKS:TELEGRAM: https://t.me/musictrustioINSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/musictrust.ioDISCORD: https://discord.gg/t53kKKAC2TWEBSITE: https://www.musictrust.io/NFT PLATFORM: https://www.songtrader.io/FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/SongTrader.ioTWITTER: https://twitter.com/SongTraderio
